member.name: T:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.AddPROMResourceTagCmdlet
member.summary: Creates tags for the specified resource.

para.para: The ARN of the resource.

summary.para: The service has not provided documentation for this parameter; please refer to the service's API reference documentation for the latest available information.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.AddPROMResourceTagCmdlet.Select
member.summary: Use the -Select parameter to control the cmdlet output. The cmdlet doesn't have a return value by default. Specifying -Select '*' will result in the cmdlet returning the whole service response (Amazon.PrometheusService.Model.TagResourceResponse). Specifying -Select '^ParameterName' will result in the cmdlet returning the selected cmdlet parameter value.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.AddPROMResourceTagCmdlet.PassThru
member.summary: Changes the cmdlet behavior to return the value passed to the ResourceArn parameter. The -PassThru parameter is deprecated, use -Select '^ResourceArn' instead. This parameter will be removed in a future version.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.AddPROMResourceTagCmdlet.Force
member.summary: This parameter overrides confirmation prompts to force the cmdlet to continue its operation. This parameter should always be used with caution.

member.name: T:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMAlertManagerDefinitionCmdlet
member.summary: Describes an alert manager definition.

para.para: The ID of the workspace to describe.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMAlertManagerDefinitionCmdlet.Select
member.summary: Use the -Select parameter to control the cmdlet output. The default value is 'AlertManagerDefinition'. Specifying -Select '*' will result in the cmdlet returning the whole service response (Amazon.PrometheusService.Model.DescribeAlertManagerDefinitionResponse). Specifying the name of a property of type Amazon.PrometheusService.Model.DescribeAlertManagerDefinitionResponse will result in that property being returned. Specifying -Select '^ParameterName' will result in the cmdlet returning the selected cmdlet parameter value.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMAlertManagerDefinitionCmdlet.PassThru
member.summary: Changes the cmdlet behavior to return the value passed to the WorkspaceId parameter. The -PassThru parameter is deprecated, use -Select '^WorkspaceId' instead. This parameter will be removed in a future version.

member.name: T:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMLoggingConfigurationCmdlet
member.summary: Describes logging configuration.

para.para: The ID of the workspace to vend logs to.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMLoggingConfigurationCmdlet.Select
member.summary: Use the -Select parameter to control the cmdlet output. The default value is 'LoggingConfiguration'. Specifying -Select '*' will result in the cmdlet returning the whole service response (Amazon.PrometheusService.Model.DescribeLoggingConfigurationResponse). Specifying the name of a property of type Amazon.PrometheusService.Model.DescribeLoggingConfigurationResponse will result in that property being returned. Specifying -Select '^ParameterName' will result in the cmdlet returning the selected cmdlet parameter value.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMLoggingConfigurationCmdlet.PassThru
member.summary: Changes the cmdlet behavior to return the value passed to the WorkspaceId parameter. The -PassThru parameter is deprecated, use -Select '^WorkspaceId' instead. This parameter will be removed in a future version.

member.name: T:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMRuleGroupsNamespaceListCmdlet
member.summary: Lists rule groups namespaces.

para.para: Optional filter for rule groups namespace name. Only the rule groups namespace that begin with this value will be returned.
The ID of the workspace.
Maximum results to return in response (default=100, maximum=1000).
Pagination token to request the next page in a paginated list. This token is obtained from the output of the previous ListRuleGroupsNamespaces request.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMRuleGroupsNamespaceListCmdlet.Select
member.summary: Use the -Select parameter to control the cmdlet output. The default value is 'RuleGroupsNamespaces'. member.summary: Changes the cmdlet behavior to return the value passed to the WorkspaceId parameter. The -PassThru parameter is deprecated, use -Select '^WorkspaceId' instead. This parameter will be removed in a future version.

member.name: T:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMWorkspaceListCmdlet
member.summary: Lists all AMP workspaces, including workspaces being created or deleted.

para.para: Optional filter for workspace alias. Only the workspaces with aliases that begin with this value will be returned.
Maximum results to return in response (default=100, maximum=1000).
Pagination token to request the next page in a paginated list. This token is obtained from the output of the previous ListWorkspaces request.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMWorkspaceListCmdlet.Select
member.summary: Use the -Select parameter to control the cmdlet output. The default value is 'Workspaces'. Specifying the name of a property of type Amazon.PrometheusService.Model.ListWorkspacesResponse will result in that property being returned. Specifying -Select '^ParameterName' will result in the cmdlet returning the selected cmdlet parameter value.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.GetPROMWorkspaceListCmdlet.PassThru
member.summary: Changes the cmdlet behavior to return the value passed to the Alias parameter. The -PassThru parameter is deprecated, use -Select '^Alias' instead. This parameter will be removed in a future version.

member.name: T:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.NewPROMAlertManagerDefinitionCmdlet
member.summary: Create an alert manager definition.

para.para: The alert manager definition data.

summary.para: The cmdlet will automatically convert the supplied parameter of type string, string[], System.IO.FileInfo or System.IO.Stream to byte[] before supplying it to the service.

para.para: The ID of the workspace in which to create the alert manager definition.
Optional, unique, case-sensitive, user-provided identifier to ensure the idempotency of the request.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.NewPROMAlertManagerDefinitionCmdlet.Select
member.summary: Use the -Select parameter to control the cmdlet output. The default value is 'Status'. Specifying -Select '*' will result in the cmdlet returning the whole service response (Amazon.PrometheusService.Model.CreateAlertManagerDefinitionResponse). Specifying the name of a property of type Amazon.PrometheusService.Model.CreateAlertManagerDefinitionResponse will result in that property being returned. Specifying -Select '^ParameterName' will result in the cmdlet returning the selected cmdlet parameter value.

member.summary: Changes the cmdlet behavior to return the value passed to the WorkspaceId parameter. The -PassThru parameter is deprecated, use -Select '^WorkspaceId' instead. This parameter will be removed in a future version.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.PROM.NewPROMAlertManagerDefinitionCmdlet.Force
member.summary: This parameter overrides confirmation prompts to force the cmdlet to continue its operation. This parameter should always be used with caution.
